metadata.name: Blink #1/6
metadata.description:
*She had always been drawn to the light. From her earliest memories, there was an inexplicable attraction to the radiant glow that permeated her surroundings. Whether it was the golden hues of the morning sun streaming through her bedroom window or the vibrant blaze of a flickering candle, she found solace and purpose in following the light.*

Blink by c0des
